pullRequest.title: Combine isAbstractClass() and isInterfaceClass() into isConcreteClass()
pullRequest.bodyText:
Combined isAbstractClass() and isInterfaceClass() into one query, isConcreteClass()
to reduce overhead, since each of these queries performs a locking operation.
Issue: #11029
Signed-off-by: Eman Elsabban eman.elsaban1@gmail.com

nodes.bodyText:
This could be combined into one operation:
return (TR::Compiler->cls.romClassOf(clazzPointer)->modifiers & (J9AccAbstract | J9AccInterface)) ? false : true;

nodes.bodyText:
! is the logical not. What you want here is to isolate the two bits you are interested in, and then test they have the values you want:
(modifiers & (J9AccInterface | J9AccAbstract)) == J9AccAbstract
